The file /Users/chrismcconnell/GitHub/Humaine Studio/assets/js/main.js has been updated. Here's the result of running `cat -n` on a snippet of the edited file:
     1â†’// Dark Mode Theme Management
     2â†’class ThemeManager {
     3â†’    constructor() {
     4â†’        this.themeToggle = null;
     5â†’        this.themeIcon = null;
     6â†’        this.currentTheme = this.getStoredTheme() || this.getPreferredTheme();
     7â†’        
     8â†’        this.init();
     9â†’    }
    10â†’
    11â†’    init() {
    12â†’        // Apply initial theme
    13â†’        this.applyTheme(this.currentTheme);
    14â†’        
    15â†’        // Wait for DOM to load
    16â†’        if (document.readyState === 'loading') {
    17â†’            document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => this.setupToggle());
    18â†’        } else {
    19â†’            this.setupToggle();
    20â†’        }
    21â†’
    22â†’        // Listen for system theme changes
    23â†’        const mediaQuery = window.matchMedia('(prefers-color-scheme: dark)');
    24â†’        mediaQuery.addListener((e) => {
    25â†’            if (!this.getStoredTheme()) {
    26â†’                this.setTheme(e.matches ? 'dark' : 'light');
    27â†’            }
    28â†’        });
    29â†’    }
    30â†’
    31â†’    setupToggle() {
    32â†’        this.themeToggle = document.querySelector('.theme-toggle');
    33â†’        this.themeIcon = document.querySelector('.theme-toggle-icon');
    34â†’        
    35â†’        if (this.themeToggle) {
    36â†’            this.updateToggleIcon();
    37â†’            this.themeToggle.addEventListener('click', () => this.toggleTheme());
    38â†’        }
    39â†’    }
    40â†’
    41â†’    getPreferredTheme() {
    42â†’        return window.matchMedia('(prefers-color-scheme: dark)').matches ? 'dark' : 'light';
    43â†’    }
    44â†’
    45â†’    getStoredTheme() {
    46â†’        return localStorage.getItem('theme');
    47â†’    }
    48â†’
    49â†’    setStoredTheme(theme) {
    50â†’        localStorage.setItem('theme', theme);
    51â†’    }
    52â†’
    53â†’    applyTheme(theme) {
    54â†’        document.documentElement.setAttribute('data-theme', theme);
    55â†’        this.currentTheme = theme;
    56â†’    }
    57â†’
    58â†’    updateToggleIcon() {
    59â†’        if (this.themeIcon) {
    60â†’            this.themeIcon.textContent = this.currentTheme === 'dark' ? 'â˜€ï¸' : 'ğŸŒ™';
    61â†’            this.themeToggle.setAttribute('aria-label', 
    62â†’                `Switch to ${this.currentTheme === 'dark' ? 'light' : 'dark'} mode`);
    63â†’        }
    64â†’    }
    65â†’
    66â†’    setTheme(theme) {
    67â†’        this.applyTheme(theme);
    68â†’        this.setStoredTheme(theme);
    69â†’        this.updateToggleIcon();
    70â†’    }
    71â†’
    72â†’    toggleTheme() {
    73â†’        const newTheme = this.currentTheme === 'dark' ? 'light' : 'dark';
    74â†’        this.setTheme(newTheme);
    75â†’    }
    76â†’}
    77â†’
    78â†’// Initialize theme manager
    79â†’const themeManager = new ThemeManager();
    80â†’
    81â†’// Smooth scrolling for navigation links
    82â†’document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    83â†’    const navLinks = document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="#"]');
    84â†’    
    85â†’    navLinks.forEach(link => {
    86â†’        link.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
    87â†’            e.preventDefault();
    88â†’            
    89â†’            const targetId = this.getAttribute('href').substring(1);
    90â†’            const targetElement = document.getElementById(targetId);
    91â†’            
    92â†’            if (targetElement) {
    93â†’                const headerOffset = 80;
    94â†’                const elementPosition = targetElement.offsetTop;
    95â†’                const offsetPosition = elementPosition - headerOffset;
    96â†’                
    97â†’                window.scrollTo({
    98â†’                    top: offsetPosition,
    99â†’                    behavior: 'smooth'
   100â†’                });
   101â†’            }
   102â†’        });
   103â†’    });
   104â†’    
   105â†’    // Add active class to navigation links based on scroll position
   106â†’    const sections = document.querySelectorAll('section[id]');
   107â†’    const navLinkElements = document.querySelectorAll('.nav-link[href^="#"]');
   108â†’    
   109â†’    function updateActiveNavLink() {
   110â†’        let current = '';
   111â†’        
   112â†’        sections.forEach(section => {
   113â†’            const sectionTop = section.offsetTop;
   114â†’            const sectionHeight = section.clientHeight;
   115â†’            if (scrollY >= (sectionTop - 200)) {
   116â†’                current = section.getAttribute('id');
   117â†’            }
   118â†’        });
   119â†’        
   120â†’        navLinkElements.forEach(link => {
   121â†’            link.classList.remove('active');
   122â†’            if (link.getAttribute('href') === '#' + current) {
   123â†’                link.classList.add('active');
   124â†’            }
   125â†’        });
   126â†’    }
   127â†’    
   128â†’    window.addEventListener('scroll', updateActiveNavLink);
   129â†’});

_**Agent (claude-sonnet-4-20250514)**_

The issue was that you had both `jekyll ~> 4.3.0` and `github-pages ~> 228` in your Gemfile. GitHub Pages pins Jekyll to version 3.9.3, so you can't use Jekyll 4.3.0 with it.

The fix is simple: remove the explicit Jekyll version and let GitHub Pages manage it. Your site will work perfectly with Jekyll 3.9.3 - all the dark mode features I implemented are compatible with both versions.

Your workflows should now work correctly! The next time you push changes, the GitHub Actions workflow will succeed.

diff --git a/assets/js/main.js b/assets/js/main.js
index 0332575..e6047ff 100644
--- a/assets/js/main.js
+++ b/assets/js/main.js
@@ -1,3 +1,83 @@
+// Dark Mode Theme Management
+class ThemeManager {
+    constructor() {
+        this.themeToggle = null;
+        this.themeIcon = null;
+        this.currentTheme = this.getStoredTheme() || this.getPreferredTheme();
+        
+        this.init();
+    }
+
+    init() {
+        // Apply initial theme
+        this.applyTheme(this.currentTheme);
+        
+        // Wait for DOM to load
+        if (document.readyState === 'loading') {
+            document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => this.setupToggle());
+        } else {
+            this.setupToggle();
+        }
+
+        // Listen for system theme changes
+        const mediaQuery = window.matchMedia('(prefers-color-scheme: dark)');
+        mediaQuery.addListener((e) => {
+            if (!this.getStoredTheme()) {
+                this.setTheme(e.matches ? 'dark' : 'light');
+            }
+        });
+    }
+
+    setupToggle() {
+        this.themeToggle = document.querySelector('.theme-toggle');
+        this.themeIcon = document.querySelector('.theme-toggle-icon');
+        
+        if (this.themeToggle) {
+            this.updateToggleIcon();
+            this.themeToggle.addEventListener('click', () => this.toggleTheme());
+        }
+    }
+
+    getPreferredTheme() {
+        return window.matchMedia('(prefers-color-scheme: dark)').matches ? 'dark' : 'light';
+    }
+
+    getStoredTheme() {
+        return localStorage.getItem('theme');
+    }
+
+    setStoredTheme(theme) {
+        localStorage.setItem('theme', theme);
+    }
+
+    applyTheme(theme) {
+        document.documentElement.setAttribute('data-theme', theme);
+        this.currentTheme = theme;
+    }
+
+    updateToggleIcon() {
+        if (this.themeIcon) {
+            this.themeIcon.textContent = this.currentTheme === 'dark' ? 'â˜€ï¸' : 'ğŸŒ™';
+            this.themeToggle.setAttribute('aria-label', 
+                `Switch to ${this.currentTheme === 'dark' ? 'light' : 'dark'} mode`);
+        }
+    }
+
+    setTheme(theme) {
+        this.applyTheme(theme);
+        this.setStoredTheme(theme);
+        this.updateToggleIcon();
+    }
+
+    toggleTheme() {
+        const newTheme = this.currentTheme === 'dark' ? 'light' : 'dark';
+        this.setTheme(newTheme);
+    }
+}
+
+// Initialize theme manager
+const themeManager = new ThemeManager();
+
 // Smooth scrolling for navigation links
 document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
     const navLinks = document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="#"]');
